description: This file implements a Tic Tac Toe game component using the Qwik framework. It manages game state, UI interactions, AI move logic, and game logic such as winner detection and game resets.

methods.name: checkWinner
methods.description: Evaluates the game board to determine if there is a winner, a draw, or if the game should continue.

methods.name: postAiMove
methods.description: Handles the game state updates after the AI makes a move, including checking for game end conditions.

methods.name: resetBoard
methods.description: Resets the game state and optionally switches the starting player.

methods.name: setMode
methods.description: Sets the game mode to either local (two-player) or AI.

methods.name: handleCellClick
methods.description: Handles user interactions when clicking on a game cell, updating the state, and triggering AI moves if enabled.

methods.name: aiMove
methods.description: Computes and executes the AI's move based on simple strategies (winning, blocking, center, or random).

methods.name: getCellLabel
methods.description: Generates a label for each cell for accessibility purposes.

methods.name: cellClass
methods.description: Determines CSS classes for each cell based on its state and whether it is part of the winning line.
